de.weltraumschaf.commons.swing
Class MenuBarBuilder

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.commons.swing.MenuBarBuilder

public final class MenuBarBuilder
extends Object

This builder offers a internal DSL for creating menu bars. Example: JMenuBar menubar = builder() .menu("File") .item("Open") .addListener(new Listener()) .end() .separator() .item("Save") .addListener(new Listener()) .end() .end() .menu("Edit") .item("foo") .end() .end() .menu("View") .item("bar") .end() .end() .menu("Window") .item("baz") .end() .end() .create();

Author:
Sven Strittmatter
